markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Daring Flourish](/Feats.aspx?ID=1072) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 75 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Firebrand Braggart](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=24)

**Prerequisites**
[Daring Act](/Feats.aspx?ID=1069)

</column>

---

You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts. At the end of a successful Daring Act, you can make a melee Strike against the target or attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the target. The target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the Strike you make during Daring Act as well as the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.
name: Daring Flourish

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Daring Flourish Source Character Guide pg. 75 2.0 Archetype Firebrand Braggart Prerequisites Daring Act --- You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts. At the end of a successful Daring Act, you can make a melee Strike against the target or attempt to Disarm the target. The target is flat-footed against the Strike you make during Daring Act as well as the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.
